abstract: Catherine Greig, longtime girlfriend of mobster James Bulger, receives indictment on count of criminal contempt by Boston federal grand jury for refusing to testify on who helped Bulger during 16-years on the run; is currently serving eight-year sentence for conspiracy to harbor fugitive, identity fraud and conspiracy to commit identity fraud.
lead_paragraph: Catherine Greig, 64, was indicted by a federal grand jury on one count of criminal contempt.

headline.main: Massachusetts: James Bulger’s Girlfriend Is Indicted in Refusal to Testify
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Bulger’s Girlfriend Is Indicted in Refusal to Testify

snippet: Catherine Greig, 64, was indicted by a federal grand jury on one count of criminal contempt.
